name: PAT_EDU_POINT_LEARNER_LN
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Most Recent Learner Line (I PED 495) item.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the education record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_LEARNER_LINE
columns.description: This item stores the line number in PED 6000 where the most recent documentation was done for a specific learner and point.
